screen.name: MessageBox
screen.title: Message
screen.applet:
# this should be factored out into some helper code, but currently demonstrates applets. from enigma import eSize, ePoint
orgwidth = self.instance.size().width() orgpos = self.instance.position() textsize = self["text"].getSize()
# y size still must be fixed in font stuff... textsize = (textsize[0] + 80, textsize[1] + 80) offset = 20 if self.type == self.TYPE_YESNO: offset = 80 wsizex = textsize[0] + 80 wsizey = textsize[1] + offset if (600 > wsizex): wsizex = 600 wsize = (wsizex, wsizey)
# resize self.instance.resize(eSize(*wsize))
# resize label self["text"].instance.resize(eSize(*textsize))
# move list listsize = (wsizex - 20, 50) self["list"].instance.move(ePoint(10, textsize[1])) self["list"].instance.resize(eSize(*listsize))
# center window newwidth = wsize[0] self.instance.move(ePoint(orgpos.x() + (orgwidth - newwidth)/2, orgpos.y()))

eLabel.text: F i l e l i s t
P l a y l i s t

widget.convert: {"template": [ MultiContentEntryText(pos = (10, 10), size = (720, 30), flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 1), # index 1 is the nim name, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (50, 45), size = (680, 30), font = 1, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 2), # index 2 is a description of the nim settings, ], "fonts": [gFont("Regular", 24), gFont("Regular", 22)], "itemHeight": 80 }

{"template": [ MultiContentEntryPixmap(pos = (10, 5), size = (60, 40), png = 2), # index 2 is the pixmap MultiContentEntryText(pos = (80, 14), size = (380, 30), flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 1), # index 1 is the language name, ], "fonts": [gFont("Regular", 21)], "itemHeight": 50 }

eLabel.text: Press OK to edit the settings.

widget.convert: {"template": [ MultiContentEntryText(pos = (60, 6), size = (560, 24), font=0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 0), # index 2 is the Menu Titel MultiContentEntryText(pos = (65, 35), size = (555, 20), font=1, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 2), # index 3 is the Description MultiContentEntryPixmapAlphaTest(pos = (10, 6), size = (48, 48), png = 3), # index 4 is the pixmap ], "fonts": [gFont("Regular", 22),gFont("Regular", 17)], "itemHeight": 60 }

{"template": [ MultiContentEntryPixmapAlphaTest(pos = (40, 6), size = (48, 48), png = 0), # index 0 is the isMounted pixmap MultiContentEntryText(pos = (200, 5), size = (200, 28), font=0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 1), # index 1 is the sharename MultiContentEntryText(pos = (380, 8), size = (250, 20), font=1, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 2), # index 2 is the IPdescription MultiContentEntryText(pos = (200, 35), size = (350, 20), font=1, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 3), # index 3 is the DIRdescription MultiContentEntryPixmapAlphaTest(pos = (550, 15), size = (48, 48), png = 4), # index 4 is the activepng pixmap MultiContentEntryPixmapAlphaTest(pos = (580, 6), size = (48, 48), png = 5), # index 4 is the mounttype pixmap ], "fonts": [gFont("Regular", 22),gFont("Regular", 17)], "itemHeight": 60 }

{"template": [ MultiContentEntryPixmapAlphaTest(pos = (10, 6), size = (48, 48), png = 1), # index 1 is the expandable/expanded/verticalline icon MultiContentEntryText(pos = (70, 17), size = (560, 26), font=2, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 2), # index 2 is the Hostname MultiContentEntryText(pos = (160, 8), size = (460, 25), font=0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 3), # index 3 is the sharename MultiContentEntryText(pos = (160, 33), size = (460, 17), font=1, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 4), # index 4 is the sharedescription MultiContentEntryPixmapAlphaTest(pos = (65, 6), size = (48, 48), png = 5), # index 5 is the nfs/cifs icon MultiContentEntryPixmapAlphaTest(pos = (110, 6), size = (48, 48), png = 6), # index 6 is the isMounted icon ], "fonts": [gFont("Regular", 22),gFont("Regular", 17),gFont("Regular", 24)], "itemHeight": 60 }

{"template": [ MultiContentEntryText(pos = (80, 7), size = (570, 50), font=0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 0), # index 0 is the name MultiContentEntryPixmapAlphaTest(pos = (10, 6), size = (48, 48), png = 3), # index 4 is the status pixmap ], "fonts": [gFont("Regular", 40)], "itemHeight": 60 }

{"template": [ MultiContentEntryPixmapAlphaBlend(pos = (18, 16), size = (48, 48), png = 4), # index 4 is the status pixmap MultiContentEntryText(pos = (95, 4), size = (460, 28), font=0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 0), # index 0 is the name MultiContentEntryText(pos = (95, 36), size = (460, 40), font=1, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT | RT_VALIGN_CENTER | RT_WRAP, text = 2), # index 2 is the description ], "fonts": [gFont("Regular", 24),gFont("Regular", 18)], "itemHeight": 80 }

{"template": [ MultiContentEntryText(pos = (5, 7), size = (230, 30), flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 0), MultiContentEntryText(pos = (240, 7), size = (330, 30), flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 1)], "fonts": [gFont("Regular", 20)], "itemHeight": 35 }

skin.screen:
{"templates": {"default": (80,[ MultiContentEntryPixmapAlphaTest(pos = (0, 2), size = (100, 75), png = 4), # index 4 is the thumbnail MultiContentEntryText(pos = (100, 2), size = (470, 23), font=0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT | RT_VALIGN_TOP| RT_WRAP, text = 1), # index 1 is the Title MultiContentEntryText(pos = (100, 30), size = (240, 20), font=1, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT | RT_VALIGN_TOP| RT_WRAP, text = 5), # index 5 is the Published Date MultiContentEntryText(pos = (100, 55), size = (240, 20), font=1, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT | RT_VALIGN_TOP| RT_WRAP, text = 6), # index 6 is the Views Count MultiContentEntryText(pos = (340, 30), size = (210, 20), font=1, flags = RT_HALIGN_RIGHT | RT_VALIGN_TOP| RT_WRAP, text = 7), # index 7 is the duration MultiContentEntryText(pos = (340, 55), size = (210, 20), font=1, flags = RT_HALIGN_RIGHT | RT_VALIGN_TOP| RT_WRAP, text = 8), # index 8 is the ratingcount ]), "state": (80,[ MultiContentEntryText(pos = (10, 2), size = (560, 28), font=2, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT | RT_VALIGN_TOP| RT_WRAP, text = 0), # index 0 is the name MultiContentEntryText(pos = (10, 30), size = (560, 50), font=3, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT | RT_VALIGN_TOP| RT_WRAP, text = 1), # index 2 is the description ]) }, "fonts": [gFont("Regular", 22),gFont("Regular", 18),gFont("Regular", 26),gFont("Regular", 20)], "itemHeight": 80 }

{"template": [ MultiContentEntryText(pos = (10, 3), size = (180, 24), font=1, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 1), # index 1 is the name MultiContentEntryText(pos = (200, 3), size = (130, 24), font=1, flags = RT_HALIGN_RIGHT, text = 2), # index 2 is the state MultiContentEntryProgress(pos = (340, 3), size = (100, 24), percent = -3), # index 3 should be progress MultiContentEntryText(pos = (450, 3), size = (110, 24), font=1, flags = RT_HALIGN_RIGHT, text = 4), # index 4 is the percentage ], "fonts": [gFont("Regular", 22),gFont("Regular", 18)], "itemHeight": 30 }
